title: HeartlandGreek - How to find it?
content:
Hello -

We would like to use "HeartlandGreek" font (see. attachment).  
But we don't know:

- Where to find it (we can't find informations on this font).  
 - Is this font free?

Thank you, have a nice day…

- Dimitri

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803031747im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture-1_3797.jpg)
author: dimitri_c

comments.content: With such bad spacing it is probably freeware.

Hello Fontgrube -

Ok... But it doesn't tell me where I may find it...

- Dimitri [http://www.thebend.be/notlookingforsuchpicturesrightnow/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803031747/http:/www.thebend.be/notlookingforsuchpicturesrightnow/ "http://www.thebend.be/notlookingforsuchpicturesrightnow/")
You might tell us where you found your sample in the first place. It looks like from a specimen sheet not like a font in use.
